entry.title: Finite monetary supply for Bitcoin
entry.summary: The statement above expresses concerns about a proposal that could potentially destroy Bitcoin. The speaker attributes the proposal to a Google employee and does not seem to have a positive outlook on it. However, no further information is provided about the nature of the proposal or why it is seen as potentially harmful to Bitcoin.It is unclear whether the speaker is referencing a specific proposal or if they are speaking more broadly about Google's involvement in the cryptocurrency space. It is worth noting that Google has been exploring blockchain technology and developing tools for building decentralized applications, though it is unclear how this relates to Bitcoin specifically.Without more information, it is difficult to assess the validity of the speaker's claim that the proposal will destroy Bitcoin. It is possible that the proposal could have negative consequences for Bitcoin, but it is also possible that it could have little impact or even be beneficial.Overall, the statement raises concerns about a proposal that could potentially harm Bitcoin and attributes it to a Google employee. However, without more context or information about the proposal itself, it is difficult to fully understand the situation.
